Pre-Game Insights: The Mavericks are 15-13 against Western Conference opponents and 2-4 in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
The Trail Blazers are 11-20 against Western Conference opponents and 4-3 in games decided by less than 4 points.
The Mavericks average 116.4 points per game, which is close to the Trail Blazers' defensive average of 108.4 points per game.
The Trail Blazers allow 111.9 points per game to opponents, slightly higher than the Mavericks' offensive average of 116.4 points per game.
